text: Reza Parkas is an Iranian-born German football manager who currently is the manager of the Bangladesh club Brothers Union. ==Coaching career== Parkas is an Iranian born German football coach, and has coaching experience in Germany, the UAE, Iran, and Oman. Parkas also worked as a Referee in Germany. He is currently the head coach of the Brothers Union club. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:German football managers Category:German expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Bangladesh
title: Reza Parkas
